product_name: REI Stratus Insulated Air Sleeping Pad
long_description: The REI Stratus Insulated Air Sleeping Pad offers warmth and comfort in a lightweight, easily packed design. Pad baffles are insulated with ultralight and ultrawarm PrimaLoft(R) Infinity fill. Air-tube construction provides cushioning; larger tubes on the outside keep you from rolling off. Quick-closing, high-flow valve. Nylon top surface has a nonslip diamond texture; polyester bottom surface resists wear; all seams are welded. R-value equals 2.9; most sleeping pads REI sells range in R-value from 1.0 (minimally insulated) to 9.5 (highly insulated). The REI Stratus Insulated-Air Sleeping Pad comes with a stuff sack.
short_description: The REI Stratus Insulated Air Sleeping Pad offers warmth and comfort in a lightweight, easily packed design.
